Uses of Interface
com.viaoa.jfc.table.OATableComponent

  • Packages that use OATableComponent 
    Package Description
    com.viaoa.jfc
    Java Swing UI components, reports, styled and image editor, that bind to OAModels (OAObjects and Hub collections).
    com.viaoa.jfc.control
    Controllers for Swing UI components so that they can use binding with OAModels.
    com.viaoa.jfc.table
    Classes that support the table editors for OATable.
